# Conventions

| Description                                                              	| Examples                           	|
|--------------------------------------------------------------------------	|------------------------------------	|
| Word in both Byz^RP^ and 81                                   	| λογος                              	|
| 81 *adds* (word not present in Byz^RP^)                       	| [λογος]{.greek-added}            	|
| 81 *omits* (word present in Byz^RP^)                          	| [λογος]{.greek-omitted}          	|
| Text fragmentary, supplied by transcriber of 81               	| [λογος]{.greek-supplied}         	|
| Text unclear, supplied by transcriber of 81                   	| [λογος]{.unclear}                	|
| Corrector's hand is superscript (corrector agrees with Byz^RP^)          	| [λογος]{.corr}                   	|
| Corrector's hand is superscript (corrector adds, not present in Byz^RP^) 	| [[λογος]{.corr}]{.greek-added} 	|
| 81 abbreviates *nomen sacrum*                                 	| [θεος]{.greek-abbr}            	|
| Gap in 81                                                     	| [―]{.gap}                        	|
:::
